thread.title: nandini puranik

author: nandini puranik
title: nandini puranik
text: I had cancelled my booking and bravofly promised me a refund of 212.15 EUR . I live in India and the exchange rate is 1 EUR = 70.59 Indian Rupees( INR ). According to this calculation, I should have got a refund of 14973.54. But, when I checked my bank statement, I received just INR 261.77 = 3.71 EUR . What about the rest of my money? It amounts to INR 14969.83 .This is a huge amount of money. Please return it.
